label: TTParty
comment: An individual, group, or body related to a Track and Trace (TT) process.

objectProperties.comment: An identifier for this TT party.
A technical characteristic managed by this TT party.
The name, expressed as text, for this TT party.
The identifier for the country of residence for this TT party, such as the country in which a person lives or in which a corporation has its place of incorporation.
A tracking animal specified for this TT party.
A location specified for this TT party.
A code specifying the role of this TT party.
A code specifying the type of TT party.
An identifier of the type for this TT party.

referencedBy.comment: The holder responsible party for this TT animal.
The receiving party specified for this TT exchanged document.
The party responsible for this TT location.
The sending party specified for this TT exchanged document.
